short_description: Meticulously Designed, Comprehensive Stationery Set: Our note taking supplies kit features a purple grid mesh pencil case, 12 pastel highlighters in assorted colors, 5 stylish gel ink pen, 6 cute mechanical pencil, 6 tube of mechanical pencil lead refills, 3 erasers, 1 6-in-1 multi-color pen, and 1 set of sticky tabs (200sheet). From highlighting textbooks to jotting down meeting notes, our cute school supplies kit offers the versatility needed to bring your ideas to life with clarity and style.

Create a Cozy and Productive Learning Atmosphere: ① 12 highlighters ensure easy reading with perfect transparency, prevent bleed-through and reduce eye strain. The versatile chisel tip creates wide and narrow lines efficiently. ② Gel ink pens come in 5 different colored shells, with quick-drying black ink for keeping your work neat. ③ The retractable multicolored pen features 6 assorted gel ink colors, allowing you to switch to your preferred color to mark important information.

Ensuring Your Work Stays Error-free: Equipped with 3 0.5mm and 3 0.7mm pencils, along with replacement lead refills, you can achieve precise writing and drawing. A comfortable triangular grip perfectly molds to your hand, guiding the right holding posture to reduce writing fatigue. Additionally, 3 erasers provide clean and precise erasing, leaving the paper clean and allowing for easy corrections.

Organization Made Easy: Stay organized with the included transparent grid pen pouch, allowing you to easily see and conveniently carry your stationery essentials wherever you go. Featuring 3 compartments, there's ample room to keep your pens separate and easily accessible. Plus, pastel-colored transparent index tabs can help you find and locate information quickly, enabling flexible categorization by color.

Save Time and Delight Your Loved Ones: Our pen and highlighter set not only streamlines your tasks by providing all the college student essentials in one go but also makes a practical gift for birthdays and Christmas. Whether it's a student heading back to school, a recent graduate, a colleague starting a new job, or a friend who studies the Bible, our pastel office supplies set is sure to make a lasting impression.
